TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit IntegerValidator extends System.Configuration.ConfigurationValidatorBase

span.span: Provides validation of an value.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类用于确保整数满足特定条件。The class is used to ensure that an integer meets specific criteria. 验证条件的实例时建立创建类。The criteria for validation are established when an instance of the class is created. 包含两个参数的构造函数可确保正在验证的整数符合最小值和最大值。The constructor with two parameters ensures that the integer being verified adheres to both a minimum and a maximum value. 带有三个参数的构造函数检查最小值和最大值，以及要验证的值是否在指定范围内。The constructor with three parameters checks both the minimum and maximum values, as well as whether the value to be validated is within the specified range. 具有四个参数构造函数可以检查前面三个参数外，还检查是否值是否等于特定的解决方法。The constructor with four parameters checks the previous three parameters and also checks whether the value is equal to a specific resolution. 方法确定正在验证的对象类型是否与预期的类型匹配。The method determines whether the object type being validated matches the expected type. 正在验证该对象被传递的参数方法。The object being validated is passed as a parameter of the method. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用类型。The following code example demonstrates how to use the type. remarks.format: ## Remarks 这构造函数可确保正在验证的整数符合最小值和最大长度。This constructor ensures that the integer being verified adheres to both a minimum and a maximum length.

param.span: 若指定验证范围是独占的，则为 。

span.span: to specify that the validation range is exclusive.

param.span: 非独占意味着要验证的值必须在指定范围内；独占意味着要验证的值必须小于最小值或大于最大值。

span.span: Inclusive means the value to be validated must be within the specified range; exclusive means that it must be below the minimum or above the maximum.

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 创建的实例时类，这构造函数检查最小值和最大值，以及验证范围是否唯一。When creating an instance of the class, this constructor checks both the minimum and maximum values, as well as whether the validation range is exclusive. 当`rangeIsExclusive`参数设置为`true`、值不能在之间`minValue`和`maxValue`参数值。When the `rangeIsExclusive` parameter is set to `true`, the value must not be between the `minValue` and `maxValue` parameter values. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用构造函数。The following code example demonstrates how to use the constructor. 此代码示例摘自更大的示例为提供类。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. remarks.format: ## Remarks 对象包含验证整数对象所需的规则。An object contains the rules necessary to validate an integer object. 实例时，规则建立创建类。The rules are established when an instance of the class is created. 作为参数传递要验证的整数对象方法。The integer object to validate is passed as a parameter of the method. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 方法。The following code example demonstrates how to use the method. 此代码示例摘自更大的示例为提供类。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class.
